name: DD Game
description:
Game Designed by: Abhishek Raju

3D modeling, Animation & Texturing by: Nehal V, Arjun P Nair & Jithin Mohan

Programming by: Nehal V

UI by: Abhishek Raju

Controlls

Use A,W,S,D keys or Arrow keys to move. Keys like O,P,X,Y for special action.

Also you can use a Xbox Controller.

SEE THE  VIDEO TO KNOW HOW TO PLAY THIS GAME

While playing this game if you find any bugs please report it to us. It will be very helpful to us.

Sent Your Feedback To buggames77@gmail.com

NOTE:The development of this project is not over completely.
